Description.Text: Credo is a modern 3-star hotel offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Druskininkai. Highlights include a cafe, free Wi-Fi and an excellent city centre location. Druskininkai is a spa town known for its abundance of natural resources. Situated close to the lake, the hotel is well placed for guests to easily experience all the town has to offer. Nearby attractions include Druskininkai water park, Grutas Park, the Snow Arena and Vilkes Golf Club. Druskininkai bus station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Druskininkai destinations. The hotel is housed in a contemporary mid-rise building with balconies on every floor. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a simple style and boast a private balcony. Amenities include a mini-fridge, a flat-screen TV, a hair dryer, a work desk and an en-suite bathroom. The cosy cafe serves European dishes. There are also plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite.
